sn22.133:1.3: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn22.133:2.1: “Idhavuso, assutava puthujjano rupassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.133:2.5: vinnanassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.133:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn22.133:4.1: “Idhavuso, sutava ariyasavako rupassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.133:4.5: vinnanassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
